title: why is so inefficient the forum, a lot of afk discussion
body: why not a single one, i find a lot of discussion about this problem, but all have a very litte number of response why riot dont make a new section or something

replies.body: There is an automated system in place as well as a reporting system in place that deals with AFKers. You wut m8?
no, that dont work. only put afk and find in the forum.
